message.body: Hi Ingrid -- sent you my proposal. I kept it to one page...hopefully this is thorough enough to convince her. Let me know what you think.
Emailed the link to you
Great. I will take a look at it ASAP.

So random to say this now but I guess since I wrote this proposal, I was just reminded that I'm really excited we are working together!! I know I shouldn't get my hopes up but if this arrangement works out for me with Mechelle, I'm so excited that I can bring in business for you!
Definitely
I am excited too! I think we will be successful because we are hardworking and focused
Hi! Sorry to bother you about this but did you get a chance to look at my thing? No pressure! I'm sure you're busy
With dog walking?!
Hahahahaha
Okay that's fine! I am just anxious haha
No worries
Not yet but I will tonight. I truly work 9am-6pm now
Actually 7
I ï¿¼
Yes
I'm managing the company while boss is away
Everytime I've been texting w you and Sofie I've been with like 5 dogs
Returning ruby then have some cat visits
Have fun with your dogs and cats and I'll ttyl
I'll look at it as soon as I'm home tonight
You'll hear from me tonight
Yeah great thanks again
Sent you the edits! Tell me if you see them.

Got them! I liked them -- I had a feeling that my writing was a little aggressive but I didn't know how to change it without sounding passive. Thank you so much. I'm meeting with her and Gosia on Monday
Good luck!!! You will rock it.
And either way, you will leave feeling good about it I think, bc you are handling yourself well.
Oh I never looked at it that way -- you're right! I will feel good after Monday.
